message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with cross-lingual stance detection, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a novel approach using memory networks, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with information retrieval and classification, which are covered under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
